summary: Mark Rothko  was a Latvian-American modern artist.
full_text: Mark Rothko , born Markus Yakovlevich Rotkovich  , was an American painter of Russian Jewish descent. Although Rothko himself refused to adhere to any art movement, he is generally identified as an Abstract Expressionist. With Jackson Pollock and Willem de Kooning, he is one of the most famous postwar American artists.
title: Mark Rothko
